name: Afterlife
description: Welcome to Afterlife, a world-building simulation that lets you create the hereafter in the here and now.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or newer Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 7 DirectX: Version 7.0 Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: 16-bit sound card Additional Notes: Mouse, Keyboard
recommended_requirements: Processor: 1.4 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 9.0c DirectX: Version 9.0c
